meta.title: asc ‚Äî App Store Connect CLI
meta.description: Open-source command-line tool for App Store Connect. Submit apps, manage versions, upload screenshots, and more ‚Äî all from your terminal. AI-agent ready with CAEOAS affordances.
meta.keywords: app store connect cli, asc, swift cli, appstoreconnect, submit app, homebrew, open source

hero.subtitle: A Swift CLI for managing your iOS and macOS apps on App Store Connect. Submit versions, manage screenshots, track builds ‚Äî with full AI-agent support via CAEOAS affordances.

features.title: Everything you need, nothing you don't
features.subtitle: Built on the official App Store Connect API, with a clean three-layer architecture and full affordance output for AI agent workflows.

feature1.title: AI-Agent Ready (CAEOAS)
feature1.description: Every response embeds ready-to-run next commands in an affordances field. No agent needs to know the full command tree ‚Äî it just follows the links.

feature2.title: Full Resource Hierarchy
feature2.description: Manage the complete App Store Connect resource tree: Apps ‚Üí Versions ‚Üí Localizations ‚Üí Screenshot Sets ‚Üí Screenshots. Plus Builds and TestFlight.

feature3.title: One-Command Submission
feature3.description: Submit any iOS or macOS version for App Store review with a single command. The CLI handles the full multi-step review submission flow automatically.

feature4.title: Multiple Output Formats
feature4.description: Designed for both humans and machines. Output as JSON (default), table, or markdown. Pipe into jq, scripts, or AI agents with ease.

step1.title: Install via Homebrew
step1.description: One command installs the latest release. No Xcode or Swift toolchain required.

step2.title: Configure your API key
step2.description: Set three environment variables from your App Store Connect API key. The CLI picks them up automatically.

step3.title: Start managing your apps
step3.description: List apps, inspect versions, upload screenshots, and submit for review ‚Äî all from your terminal or from an AI agent.

cta.title: Automate your App Store Connect workflow

footer.description: Open-source CLI tool for App Store Connect. Built with Swift.
